preCopyScript.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_d2b_bid_item_detail
 WHERE demandyear = '@{variables('demandyear')}' 
  AND  dcsno = '@{variables('dcsno')}'
  AND  orntcode = '@{variables('orntcode')}'
  ;

delete from  cd_ods.tb_d2b_bid_item_detail
 WHERE demandyear = '@{variables('demandyear')}' 
  AND  dcsno = '@{variables('dcsno')}'
  AND  orntcode = '@{variables('orntcode')}'
  ;

query.value:
SELECT demandyear , dcsno , orntcode ,  pblancNo, pblancOdr
FROM 
(
SELECT COALESCE (b.dcsno, 'xxxxx') AS b_dcsno 
     , a.dcsno AS dcsno
     , a.orntcode  AS orntcode
     , a.pblancno AS pblancno
     , a.pblancOdr AS pblancOdr
     , a.demandyear  AS demandyear
FROM cd_ods.tb_d2b_cmpt_bid_notice_list a
  LEFT OUTER join   cd_ods.tb_d2b_cmpt_bid_notice_detail b
on a.dcsno  = b.dcsno
  AND a.pblancno = b.pblancno
  AND a.pblancOdr = b.pblancOdr
  AND a.pblancdate  = b.pblancdate 
) a
WHERE a.b_dcsno = 'xxxxx'

source.query:
SELECT 
  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYYMM') AS yyyymm,
--  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYY12') AS edt,
  judgeKind
FROM CURRENT_DATE dd
CROSS JOIN (
    VALUES 
      ('4304'),('9903')
) AS hs(judgeKind)
;

SELECT 
  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYYMM') AS yyyymm,
--  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYY12') AS edt,
  judgeKind
FROM CURRENT_DATE dd
CROSS JOIN (
    VALUES 
      ('4402')
) AS hs(judgeKind)
;

query.value:
select '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE, '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2,3,4,5]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '@{variables('yyyymm')}'
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE, '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '@{variables('yyyymm')}'
;

select '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[1,2]) as DATA_GBN
;

select '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
;

select COMP_NAME as COMP_NAME, '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_MONTH_BID_RESULT_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '@{variables('yyyymm')}'
;

select COMP_NAME as COMP_NAME, '@{variables('yyyymm')}'  as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_MONTH_BID_RESULT_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '@{variables('yyyymm')}' 
;

select to_char(now(), 'YYYYMM') as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
;

select COMP_NAME as COMP_NAME,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_MONTH_BID_RESULT_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMM')
;
